content: दभ्, दंभ् I. {c1c} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (दभति or दभ्नोति, दब्ध; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} धिप्सति, धीप्सति, दिदंभिषति) {@--1@} To injure, hurt. {@--2@} To deceive, cheat. {@--3@} To go. -II. {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (दंभयति-ते) To impel, propel, drive onward.
दंभ् {vI.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> See दभ्. {vII.v} {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} or {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (दंभयति-ते) {@--1@} To kill, destroy, strike down. {@--2@} (<ab>A.</ab>) To collect, arrange, string.
